thread.title: TABLE-Foreign trading in Japan stocks for latest week

author: Reuters Editorial
title: TABLE-Foreign trading in Japan stocks for latest week

organizations.name: institutions individuals foreigners securities cos feb

text: TOKYO, Feb 8 (Reuters) - Weekly net trading in shares on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange , Japan's main stock exchange, in thousands of yen. A negative figure indicates net selling. Week to: TOTAL Proprietary Brokerage Feb 2 -25,322,134 -322,323,000 297,000,866 Jan 26 -20,055,699 -2,475,924 -17,579,775 Jan 19 -7,073,908 204,353,194 -211,427,102 Jan 12 -17,596,966 -151,318,233 133,721,267 Jan 5 11,405,874 92,667,147 -81,261,273 Breakdown of brokerage totals: Week to: Institutions Individuals Foreigners Securities Cos Feb 2 371,333,662 254,716,008 -331,711,422 2,662,618 Jan 26 149,002,971 189,570,912 -358,861,679 2,708,021 Jan 19 34,899,818 -41,158,770 -199,120,712 -6,047,438 Jan 12 -9,969,078 167,244,053 -21,979,669 -1,574,039 Jan 5 13,223,668 -566,547,996 481,979,330 -9,916,275 Source: Tokyo Stock Exchange (Compiled by Tokyo Newsroom)
